original_title: Atomic Vixens: Escape from the Valley of the Sluts
overview: Diabolical L.I.M.P. International and its mysterious leader, Deuce, have taken over the U.N. Special Security Council's defense space on the moon. The U.N. calls upon the Atomic Vixens to use their seductive superpowers to save the Earth.
title: Atomic Vixens: Escape from the Valley of the Sluts
